Text:
This is really bad guys

It's not even full nudity, and only the first girl is hot.

Honestly the only good thing about this is the how they tried to copy all the popular songs by getting other people to sing them. 

**** WARNING

The screen is always split in 2 pieces, so if you don't have a 3d tv this is garbage. It's unwatchable without 3-d because the aspect ratio is messed up. Also the girls take things off and because of the bad editing they put them back on again wtf!

Also the girl on the cover isn't even in it... at least not in that costume...

I'm sorry but you'll see how bad this is. Thanks anyway to the uploader.
seriously dude??   your bitching about seeing sidebyside images for a 3d movie?   maybe you should buy a 3dtv before you download 3d porn. shit

John, you truly are a genius, you discovered 3d looks bad on 2d tvs! And all by yourself. Wow.

Now, to those that actually have a 3D TV, this works perfectly! The quality is very good, the model has big boobs, thus is hot, and the 3d works very well. There is a constant degree of depth, very well done.

Thanks to the uploader!
